title: bogdan198
author: bogdan198
created_time: July 31, 2022, 01:23:28 PMLast edit: July 31, 2022, 07:00:11 PM by bogdan198
content: The mecha fight club project is going to build a metaverse in which players will collect, train and fight in arenas with their mechabots (fighting cocks). The project will involve AI that will give each mechabat an individual style of play, 41,000 genesis mechabots will be released over time, now the first sale of 6969 TAE mechabots is underway at a price of 6,969 solThe project has raised $45 million from funds such as a16z, solana ventures, MantisÂ  and other smaller ones.You can learn more about how and what is planned to be implemented in this game by watching this short video review or by reading the technical document.Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yjEmr3Iyd4w and https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CBN2m-bYNa8The White Paper (Eng.): https://docsend.com/view/4ixubjgapqgkwcz6White Paper (in Russian): https://docs.google.com/document/d/1g_V-PObsxb4B0up6JM0IJToJueQXxIVu6tLCJwxPDR0/editWebsite: https://mechafightclub.comdisagreements: https://discord.gg/mechafightclub
